name: Andrew Rodriguez
coverLetter: Hello Ive been trimming for about 3 years and im very comfortable handling buds. Im mainly looking for a fulltime 9-5 type of employment. I live in costa mesa, Ca and i am mobile. i can trim anywhere from 1- 2 1/2 lbs a days depending on the type of flower. Im very dependable and very reliable. I can work unsupervised aswell and under strict super vision.
